attributes.action: invest in the ongoing redevelopment of silverstone motor racing circuit, to preserve the venue for the british grand prix for years to come.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the government invest in the redevelopment of silverstone. Great Britain is the home of motor racing and we produce the worlds finest constructors and engineers in this field. We need to demonstrate to the world that we are a world leader in design innovation and technology and silverstone should be the showcase.
